nodes.text: Rodian Trad Co was a Rodian corporation active at the time of the Invasion of Scipio. It was one of several company names scrolling across the screens in Rush Clovis' office atop the Main Vault fortress on Scipio.

Rodian Trad Co first appeared under the name Rodian Trading Co. in the 2005 Legends Star Wars Galaxies expansion Rage of the Wookiees. It was established to be canon by "Crisis at the Heart," the seventh episode of the animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' sixth season.
